document.long_desc: COMPLAINT against BP Oil Supply Co. (Filing fee $ 350. Receipt #ANC003598), filed by Petro Star Inc.(NXL, COURT STAFF) (Entered: 04/04/2011)

JUDGMENT that action dismissed on merits; def recover costs from plf. Signed by Judge Ralph R. Beistline on 12/10/12. (PRR, COURT STAFF) (Additional attachment(s) added on 1/3/2013: # 1 Judgment redistributed with costs added) (NKD, COURT STAFF). (Entered: 12/10/2012)
